attributes.action: Keep grassroots Football going throughout Lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to fight to keep grassroots football for YOUTH going throughout new restrictions. Benefits: 

- Physical health maintained or increased during restrictions 

- Mental health maintained or increased due to social aspect of sport & looking forward to the activity each week. 

- Improves parents mental health. Taking your child & watching your child will support adult mental health
attributes.background: It is well known that outdoor transmission of the Covid 19 is minimal if at all happening. All grassroots football clubs have guidelines & processes in place to make football safe. This petition is to fight to keep grassroots football for YOUTH going throughout new restrictions.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557169
